      static PlayState calculatePoints​(PlayState ps, GameSettings gameSettings, boolean declarerWins)
      calculates the value of the game.
      static PlayState calculatePointsBierlachs​(PlayState ps, boolean declarerWins)
      only minuspoints here for the player/s who won.
      static PlayState calculatePointsNormal​(PlayState ps, boolean declarerWins)
      if declarer won, the value of the game is added to his/her gamePoints else twice the value is subtracted from his/her score.
      static PlayState calculatePointsOverBit​(PlayState ps)
      The amount subtracted from the declarer's score is twice the least multiple of the base value of the game actually played which would have fulfilled the bid.
      static PlayState calculatePointsSeegerfabian​(PlayState ps, boolean declarerWins)
      declarer gets or looses (the playValue + 50).
      static java.util.List<Player> calculateWinner​(PlayState ps)
      Calculates the winner of the play, and saves it in the boolean singlePlayerWins uses calculatePoinsOfStack.

      returns true if declarer over bid false if not.
